attributes.action: make women's sanitary items available on the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women are spending their money on somehting that cannot be avoided. Contraception can be obtained via the NHS, but the simplest form of contraception is to not have intercourse at all. Mentruation is an unavoidable consequence and so the products that cater for it should be free.
